date: Fri Apr 08 2022 20:52:36 GMT+1000 (Australian Eastern Standard Time)
description: Michelle Yeoh joined Twitter Movies to read fan tweets while promoting Everything Everywhere All At Once.  She said that she initially thought Ang Lee's idea for one fight scene in Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon was a joke. Yeoh is a well-known figure in the world of action cinema, having starred alongside Jackie Chan in Supercop 2, Tomorrow Never Dies, Gunpowder Milkshake, Shang-Chi and the Legend of the Ten Rings. The film is renowned for its wuxia style and its impressive fight choreography.

topicText:
Why Michelle Yeoh wanted to play someone 'very ordinary'
'We have to stand up for ourselves and be courageous enough to have a voice,' said Michelle Yeoh, star of 'Everything Everywhere All at Once.'
Michelle Yeoh's Career in Photos
As Michelle Yeoh's latest film, Everything Everywhere All at Once, debuts, see how the actress has flourished through the years.
Michelle Yeoh Conquers the Universe(s)
Michelle Yeoh Conquers the Universe(s). Why the Hong-Kong cinema icon took on the role(s) of a lifetime in an absurdist comedy about multiverses — and ended up ...
Michelle Yeoh Reads Fan Tweets, Reminds Us She Is the Queen
Michelle Yeoh joined Twitter Movies to read fan tweets while promoting Everything Everywhere All At Once. The results are amazing.
Michelle Yeoh Thought Crouching Tiger's Weapons Fight Idea Was ...
Michelle Yeoh reveals that she thought Ang Lee was joking when he first described the weapon-filled fight scene in Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon.
Everything Everywhere All At Once May Be Too Trippy for Its ...
It's a thrill to see Michelle Yeoh's career thriving, no matter what you end up thinking about her latest project, the action fantasy Everything Everywhere ...
